text: Duje Mrdeša (born 14 June 1997) is a Croatian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for NK Bedem Ivankovo. ==Career== At the end of January 2019, Mrdeša re-joined NK Bedem Ivankovo.Duje Mrdeša trebao bi biti veliko pojačanje, glas-slavonije.hr, 1 February 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:HNK Rijeka II players Category:HNK Cibalia players Category:PFC Lokomotiv Plovdiv players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Bulgaria Category:Association football midfielders
title: Duje Mrdeša
